data.lean: lemma example1 (x y z : mynat) : x * y + z = x * y + z :=
data.editorText: refl,

data.lean: lemma example2 (x y : mynat) (h : y = x + 7) : 2 * y = 2 * (x + 7) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma example3 (a b : mynat) (h : succ a = b) : succ(succ(a)) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
rw h,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_succ_zero (a : mynat) : a + succ(0) = succ(a) :=
data.editorText:
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_add (n : mynat) : 0 + n = n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a + b) + c = a + (b + c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma succ_add (a b : mynat) : succ a + b = succ (a + b) :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_comm (a b : mynat) : a + b = b + a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,
rw succ_add,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_add_one (n : mynat) : succ n = n + 1 :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d HI,
rw zero_add,
refl,
rw succ_add,
rw HI,
refl,

data.lean: lemma add_right_comm (a b c : mynat) : a + b + c = a + c + b :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d HI,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw succ_add,
rw HI,
refl,

data.lean: lemma zero_mul (m : mynat) : 0 * m = 0 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_zero,
rw hd,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_one (m : mynat) : m * 1 = m :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_zero,
rw zero_add,
refl,

data.lean: lemma one_mul (m : mynat) : 1 * m = m :=
data.editorText:
induction m with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
refl,
rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw add_succ,
rw add_zero,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_add (t a b : mynat) : t * (a + b) = t * a + t * b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
rw add_zero,
refl,
rw add_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
rw add_assoc,
rw mul_succ,
refl,

data.lean: lemma mul_assoc (a b c : mynat) : (a * b) * c = a * (b * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd,
repeat {rw mul_zero},
rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
rw mul_succ,
rwa mul_add,

data.lean: lemma succ_mul (a b : mynat) : succ a * b = a * b + b :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
rw add_zero,
rwa mul_zero,
rw mul_succ,
rw add_succ,
rw hd,
rw add_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rwa add_right_comm,

data.lean: lemma add_mul (a b t : mynat) : (a + b) * t = a * t + b * t :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw zero_mul,
rwa add_zero,
rw add_succ,
rw succ_mul,
rw hd,
rw succ_mul,
rwa add_assoc,

data.lean: lemma mul_comm (a b : mynat) : a * b = b * a :=
data.editorText:
induction b with d hd,
rw mul_zero,
rwa zero_mul,
rw mul_succ,
rw hd,
rwa succ_mul,

data.lean: lemma mul_left_comm (a b c : mynat) : a * (b * c) = b * (a * c) :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd,
repeat {rw mul_zero},
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_succ,
rw mul_add,
rw hd,
rw mul_add,
rwa mul_comm b a,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_zero : (0 : mynat) ^ (0 : mynat) = 1 :=
data.editorText: rwa pow_zero,

data.lean: lemma zero_pow_succ (m : mynat) : (0 : mynat) ^ (succ m) = 0 :=
data.editorText:
rw pow_succ,
rwa mul_zero,

data.lean: lemma pow_one (a : mynat) : a ^ (1 : mynat) = a :=
data.editorText:
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw pow_succ,
rw pow_zero,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
rw succ_mul,
rw zero_mul,
rwa zero_add,

data.lean: lemma one_pow (m : mynat) : (1 : mynat) ^ m = 1 :=
data.editorText:
induction m with d hd,
rwa pow_zero,
rw pow_succ,
rw mul_one,
rwa hd,

data.lean: lemma pow_add (a m n : mynat) : a ^ (m + n) = a ^ m * a ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
rw add_zero,
rw pow_zero,
rwa mul_one,
rw add_succ,
rw pow_succ,
rw hd,
rw pow_succ,
rwa mul_assoc,

data.lean: lemma mul_pow (a b n : mynat) : (a * b) ^ n = a ^ n * b ^ n :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
repeat {rw pow_zero},
rwa one_mul,
rw pow_succ,
rw hd,
repeat {rw pow_succ},
rw mul_assoc,
rw ← mul_left_comm a,
rwa mul_assoc,

data.lean: lemma pow_pow (a m n : mynat) : (a ^ m) ^ n = a ^ (m * n) :=
data.editorText:
induction n with d hd,
rw pow_zero,
rw mul_zero,
rwa pow_zero,
rw pow_succ,
rw hd,
rw mul_succ,
rwa pow_add,

data.lean:
lemma add_squared (a b : mynat) :
  (a + b) ^ (2 : mynat) = a ^ (2 : mynat) + b ^ (2 : mynat) + 2 * a * b :=
data.editorText:
rw two_eq_succ_one,
rw one_eq_succ_zero,
repeat {rw pow_succ},
repeat {rw pow_zero},
repeat {rw one_mul},
rw add_mul,
rw mul_add,
rw mul_add,
rw succ_mul,
rw succ_mul,
rw zero_mul,
rw zero_add,
rw add_mul,
rw mul_comm b a,
rw add_comm (a * b) (b * b),
rw add_right_comm,
rw add_assoc,
rw add_assoc (a * a) (b * b) (a * b + a * b),
rwa ← add_assoc (b * b) (a * b) (a * b),

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h(p),

data.lean: example : mynat → mynat :=
data.editorText:
intro n,
exact 3*n+2,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t := j(q),
have u := l(t),
assumption,

data.lean:
example (P Q R S T U: Type)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t := j(q),
have u := l(t),
assumption,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
assumption,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Type) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro pqr,
intro pq,
intro p,
have q := pq(p),
have qr := pqr(p),
have r := qr(q),
assumption,

data.lean: example (P Q F : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → F) → (P → F)) :=
data.editorText:
intro pq,
intro qf,
intro p,
have q := pq(p),
have f := qf(q),
assumption,

data.lean: example (P Q : Type) : (P → Q) → ((Q → empty) → (P → empty)) :=
data.editorText:
intro pq,
intro qe,
intro p,
have q := pq(p),
have f := qe(q),
assumption,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Type)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
apply f15,
have b := f1(a),
have e := f2(b),
have f := f5(e),
have g := f8(f),
have j := f9(g),
have i := f11(j),
assumption,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (h : P → Q) : Q :=
data.editorText: exact h(p),

data.lean: lemma imp_self (P : Prop) : P → P :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
exact p,

data.lean:
lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t := j(q),
have u := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean:
lemma maze (P Q R S T U: Prop)
(p : P)
(h : P → Q)
(i : Q → R)
(j : Q → T)
(k : S → T)
(l : T → U)
: U :=
data.editorText:
have q := h(p),
have t := j(q),
have u := l(t),
exact u,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : P → (Q → P) :=
data.editorText:
intro p,
intro q,
exact p,

data.lean: example (P Q R : Prop) : (P → (Q → R)) → ((P → Q) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro f,
intro p,
intro h,
have q := p h,
have r := f h q,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma imp_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P → Q) → ((Q → R) → (P → R)) :=
data.editorText:
intro hpq,
intro hqr,
intro p,
have q := hpq p,
have r := hqr q,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive (P Q : Prop) : (P → Q) → (¬ Q → ¬ P) :=
data.editorText:
intro hpq,
repeat {rw not_iff_imp_false},
intro hqf,
intro p,
have q := hpq p,
apply hqf,
exact q,

data.lean:
example (A B C D E F G H I J K L : Prop)
(f1 : A → B) (f2 : B → E) (f3 : E → D) (f4 : D → A) (f5 : E → F)
(f6 : F → C) (f7 : B → C) (f8 : F → G) (f9 : G → J) (f10 : I → J)
(f11 : J → I) (f12 : I → H) (f13 : E → H) (f14 : H → K) (f15 : I → L)
 : A → L :=
data.editorText:
intro a,
apply f15,
apply f11,
apply f9,
apply f8,
apply f5,
apply f2,
apply f1,
exact a,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) (p : P) (q : Q) : P ∧ Q :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact p,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ P :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p q,
split,
exact q,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma and_trans (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ Q → Q ∧ R → P ∧ R :=
data.editorText:
intro pq,
intro qr,
cases pq with p q,
cases qr with q r,
split,
exact p,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with hpq hqp,
intro h,
cases h with hqr hrq,
split,
intro h,
apply hqr,
apply hpq,
exact h,
intro r,
apply hqp,
apply hrq,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma iff_trans (P Q R : Prop) : (P ↔ Q) → (Q ↔ R) → (P ↔ R) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with hpq hqp,
intro h,
cases h with hqr hrq,
split,
intro h,
apply hqr,
apply hpq,
exact h,
intro r,
apply hqp,
apply hrq,
exact r,

data.lean: example (P Q : Prop) : Q → (P ∨ Q) :=
data.editorText:
intro q,
right,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma or_symm (P Q : Prop) : P ∨ Q → Q ∨ P :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p q,
right,
exact p,
left,
exact q,

data.lean: lemma and_or_distrib_left (P Q R : Prop) : P ∧ (Q ∨ R) ↔ (P ∧ Q) ∨ (P ∧ R) :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro p_qr,
cases p_qr with p qr,
cases qr with q r,
left,
split,
exact p,
exact q,
right,
split,
exact p,
exact r,
intro pq_pr,
cases pq_pr with pq pr,
cases pq with p q,
split,
exact p,
left,
exact q,
cases pr with p r,
split,
exact p,
right,
exact r,

data.lean: lemma contra (P Q : Prop) : (P ∧ ¬ P) → Q :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with p np,
exfalso,
apply np,
exact p,

data.lean: lemma contrapositive2 (P Q : Prop) : (¬ Q → ¬ P) → (P → Q) :=
data.editorText:
by_cases p : P,
by_cases q : Q,
repeat {cc},

data.lean: theorem succ_inj' {a b : mynat} (hs : succ(a) = succ(b)) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
have h := succ_inj hs,
exact h,

data.lean: theorem succ_succ_inj {a b : mynat} (h : succ(succ(a)) = succ(succ(b))) :  a = b :=
data.editorText:
have ha := succ_inj h,
have hb := succ_inj ha,
exact hb,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_of_eq {a b : mynat} : a = b → succ(a) = succ(b) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rwa h,

data.lean: theorem succ_eq_succ_iff (a b : mynat) : succ a = succ b ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact succ_inj,
exact succ_eq_succ_of_eq,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel (a t b : mynat) : a + t = b + t → a = b :=
data.editorText:
induction t with d hd,
repeat {rw add_zero},
intro ab,
exact ab,
repeat {rw add_succ},
intro shd,
have hdl := succ_inj shd,
apply hd,
exact hdl,

data.lean: theorem add_left_cancel (t a b : mynat) : t + a = t + b → a = b :=
data.editorText:
induction t with d hd,
repeat {rw zero_add},
intro aeb,
exact aeb,
repeat {rw succ_add},
intro shd,
have hdl := succ_inj shd,
apply hd,
exact hdl,

data.lean: theorem add_right_cancel_iff (t a b : mynat) :  a + t = b + t ↔ a = b :=
data.editorText:
split,
exact add_right_cancel a t b,
intro h,
rwa h,

data.lean: lemma eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self {a b : mynat} : a + b = a → b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
rw ← add_zero a at h,
rw add_assoc a 0 b at h,
rw zero_add b at h,
have hd := add_left_cancel a b 0,
apply hd,
exact h,

data.lean: theorem succ_ne_zero (a : mynat) : succ a ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
symmetry,
exact zero_ne_succ a,

data.lean: lemma add_left_eq_zero {{a b : mynat}} (H : a + b = 0) : b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases b with d,
rwa add_zero a at H,
rw add_succ a at H,
exfalso,
have h := succ_ne_zero (a + d),
exact h(H),

data.lean: lemma add_right_eq_zero {a b : mynat} : a + b = 0 → a = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases b with d,
rw add_zero,
intro h,
exact h,
rw add_succ,
have f := succ_ne_zero (a + d),
intro h,
exfalso,
exact f h,

data.lean: theorem add_one_eq_succ (d : mynat) : d + 1 = succ d :=
data.editorText: rwa succ_eq_add_one,

data.lean: lemma ne_succ_self (n : mynat) : n ≠ succ n :=
data.editorText:
cases n with d,
apply zero_ne_succ,
intro h,
have hd := succ_inj h,
rw succ_eq_add_one at hd,
symmetry at hd,
have hdd := eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self hd,
rw one_eq_succ_zero at hdd,
have hddd := succ_ne_zero 0,
exact hddd hdd,

data.lean: theorem mul_pos (a b : mynat) : a ≠ 0 → b ≠ 0 → a * b ≠ 0 :=
data.editorText:
intros h hd hdd,
cases b with d,
rw mul_zero a at hdd,
exact hd hdd,
rw mul_succ a at hdd,
have az := add_left_eq_zero hdd,
exact h az,

data.lean:
theorem eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero (a b : mynat) (h : a * b = 0) :
  a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases b with d,
right,
rwa mul_zero a at h,
left,
rw mul_succ at h,
apply add_left_eq_zero h,

data.lean: theorem mul_eq_zero_iff (a b : mynat): a * b = 0 ↔ a = 0 ∨ b = 0 :=
data.editorText:
split,
intro h,
apply eq_zero_or_eq_zero_of_mul_eq_zero a b,
exact h,
intro h,
cases h with l r,
rw l,
rwa zero_mul,
rw r,
rwa mul_zero,

data.lean: theorem mul_left_cancel (a b c : mynat) (ha : a ≠ 0) : a * b = a * c → b = c :=
data.editorText:
induction c with d hd generalizing b,
rw mul_zero,
intro h,
rw mul_eq_zero_iff at h,
cases h with a b,
exfalso,
apply ha a,
exact b,
intro h,
cases b,
rw mul_zero at h,
symmetry at h,
rw mul_eq_zero_iff at h,
cases h with l r,
exfalso,
apply ha l,
symmetry at r,
apply r,
repeat {rw mul_succ at h},
apply succ_eq_succ_of_eq,
rw add_right_cancel_iff at h,
apply hd b,
exact h,

data.lean: lemma one_add_le_self (x : mynat) : x ≤ 1 + x :=
data.editorText:
use 1,
apply add_comm,

data.lean: lemma le_refl (x : mynat) : x ≤ x :=
data.editorText:
use 0,
rwa add_zero,

data.lean: theorem le_succ (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b → a ≤ (succ b) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with c hc,
rw hc,
use succ c,
rwa add_succ,

data.lean: lemma zero_le (a : mynat) : 0 ≤ a :=
data.editorText:
use a,
rwa zero_add,

data.lean: theorem le_trans (a b c : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hbc : b ≤ c) : a ≤ c :=
data.editorText:
cases hab with d hd,
cases hbc with e he,
rw he,
rw hd,
use (d + e),
rwa add_assoc a d e,

data.lean: theorem le_antisymm (a b : mynat) (hab : a ≤ b) (hba : b ≤ a) : a = b :=
data.editorText:
cases hab with d hd,
cases hba with e he,
rw he at hd,
symmetry at hd,
rw add_assoc b e d at hd,
have f := eq_zero_of_add_right_eq_self hd,
have f2 := add_right_eq_zero f,
rw f2 at he,
rwa add_zero at he,

data.lean: lemma le_zero (a : mynat) (h : a ≤ 0) : a = 0 :=
data.editorText:
cases h with d hd,
symmetry at hd,
apply add_right_eq_zero hd,

data.lean: lemma succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) (h : a ≤ b) : succ a ≤ succ b :=
data.editorText:
cases h with d hd,
rw hd,
use d,
rwa succ_add a d,

data.lean: theorem le_total (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∨ b ≤ a :=
data.editorText:
revert a,
induction b with d hd,
intro a,
right,
apply zero_le,
intro a,
cases a with e he,
left,
apply zero_le,
cases hd e,
left,
apply succ_le_succ,
apply h,
right,
apply succ_le_succ,
apply h,

data.lean: lemma le_succ_self (a : mynat) : a ≤ succ a :=
data.editorText:
apply le_succ,
apply le_refl,

data.lean: theorem add_le_add_right {a b : mynat} : a ≤ b → ∀ t, (a + t) ≤ (b + t) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
intro t,
cases h with d hd,
rw hd,
use d,
rwa add_right_comm a t d,

data.lean: theorem le_of_succ_le_succ (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ succ b → a ≤ b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with d hd,
rw succ_add at hd,
have e := succ_inj hd,
use d,
apply e,

data.lean: theorem not_succ_le_self (a : mynat) : ¬ (succ a ≤ a) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
induction a with d hd,
have he := le_zero (succ 0) h,
have hf := succ_ne_zero 0,
apply hf he,
apply hd,
have he := le_of_succ_le_succ (succ d) d,
apply he(h),

data.lean:
theorem add_le_add_left {a b : mynat} (h : a ≤ b) (t : mynat) :
  t + a ≤ t + b :=
data.editorText:
induction t with d hd,
rw zero_add,
rwa zero_add,
repeat {rw succ_add},
apply succ_le_succ,
apply hd,

data.lean: lemma lt_aux_one (a b : mynat) : a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) → succ a ≤ b :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
cases h with d hd,
cases d with e he,
cases e with f hf,
rw add_zero at he,
exfalso,
apply hd,
use 0,
symmetry,
rwa add_zero,
use f,
rw add_succ at he,
rwa succ_add,

data.lean: lemma lt_aux_two (a b : mynat) : succ a ≤ b → a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a) :=
data.editorText:
intro h,
split,
apply le_of_succ_le_succ,
apply le_succ,
apply h,
intro hd,
have d := le_trans (succ a) b a,
have e := d h hd,
apply not_succ_le_self a,
apply e,

data.lean: lemma lt_iff_succ_le (a b : mynat) : a < b ↔ succ a ≤ b :=
data.editorText:
split,
apply lt_aux_one,
apply lt_aux_two,
